表格外勤车辆表的代码预览

drop table if exists workcars;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: workcars */
/*==============================================================*/
create table workcars
(
wid int not null,
teamid int,
caid varchar(20),
carBrand varchar(20),
carType varchar(50),
clic int,
primary key (wid)
);

alter table workcars add constraint FK_班组与车辆 foreign key (teamid)
references team (teamid) on delete restrict on update restrict;
